entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -10.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
